latest_revision.text:
Goal is a ''short'' checklist that fits on an 8.5 x 11-inch sheet of paper. Deep details should go on the main [[Large_80W_Laser]] page.

If you add new info here, please also pick what you'll delete from this page to make room!

* Laser switch on
* Open LaserCut 5.3
* Establish connection by clicking DownLoad (can just close download window again)
* Z- to get bed well below laser head
* Y+/X+ to move laser head to far corner
* If you're using honeycomb bed, place it
* Set up layers
** Cut/Engrave with appropriate speed/power (see the [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BpAYtyFIKQ4UoXv31mKC43YFxfBk34d_q-muw1SP2aU/edit?usp=sharing log])
** Air assist ("Always blow")
** Ensure layer is "On" so laser turns on
** Overlap: Normally 0.08
* Check "Immediate" if you want the cut positioned relative to current head position
* Set laser origin
* DownLoad (yes, again)
** Del all
** Download current
* Run Box and make sure laser head's movement is entirely within material
** If it beeps and won't run, are the bounds of your cut entirely within the bounds of the cutting bed?
** What is your laser origin set to?
* Start
